TopicTitle: S.H.I.E.L.D Mini Helicarrier (No TweakScale, only QuizTech AeroPack)

Articles.Content:
This is the first ship I have uploaded. Is not high on part count, only 189 parts, and also is totally stock except for 2 fuel tanks and the turbines that come with the QuizTech AeroPack.

![92vPfTk.png](http://i.imgur.com/92vPfTk.png)

[DOWNLOAD](http://kerbalx.com/Overlocker/SHIELD-Helicarrier)
Very nice looking, but got any pics of it in flight?
Actually I have a crappy computer, so just after loading it on the Runway the FPS goes to 2 or 1 ... so I can't fly it for screenshots sorry.
I congratulate you, good sir, for making such a fine replica.
